mapper.select: SELECT emp.empno, emp.name, emp.salary, emp.restyn, emp.paymentst, emp.privateinsurance, sum(ex.dvamt) as expend, d.departmentname as departmentname, g.gradename as gradename FROM employee as emp LEFT JOIN departmentcode as d ON emp.departmentcd = d.departmentcd LEFT JOIN gradecode as g ON emp.gradecd = g.gradecd LEFT JOIN expendhistory as ex ON emp.empno = ex.empno AND (ex.paidyn = 'n' OR ex.paidyn IS NULL) where emp.retireyn = 'n' AND (emp.paymentst IS NULL OR emp.paymentst < STR_TO_DATE(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) GROUP BY emp.empno

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO payrollhistory (empno, privateinsurance, netpay, pay, paymentdate, expend) VALUES (#{emp.empno},#{emp.privateinsurance},#{emp.salary}+#{emp.expend}-#{emp.privateinsurance},#{emp.salary},#{emp.paymentst},#{emp.expend})
